data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi sẽ cho bạn biết nếu có điều gì khẩn cấp xảy ra.
data.en_hint: We'll let you know if something urgent comes up.
data.content_game_1: We'll let you know if something urgent comes up.
data.answer_en_hint: We'll let you know if something urgent comes up.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy bắt đầu nhận thức rõ ràng là cô ấy đã bị lừa.
data.en_hint: It was beginning to dawn on her that she had been fooled.
data.content_game_1: It was beginning to dawn on her that she had been fooled.
data.answer_en_hint: It was beginning to dawn on her that she had been fooled.

data.trans_hint: Chiếc taxi dừng lại bên ngoài ngôi nhà.
data.en_hint: The taxi drew up outside the house.
data.content_game_1: The taxi drew up outside the house.
data.answer_en_hint: The taxi drew up outside the house.

data.trans: Chợt nảy ra, loé lên (ý nghĩ)
data.trans_hint: Anh chợt nhận ra rằng vợ mình đang ngoại tình.
data.en_hint: It occurred to him that his wife was having an affair.
data.content_game_1: It occurred to him that his wife was having an affair.
data.answer_en_hint: It occurred to him that his wife was having an affair.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy đã giải quyết việc sắp xếp và mọi thứ lại chạy trơn tru và hiệu quả.
data.en_hint: He saw to the arrangements and everything ran smoothly and efficiently.
data.content_game_1: He saw to the arrangements and everything ran smoothly and efficiently.
data.answer_en_hint: He saw to the arrangements and everything ran smoothly and efficiently.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi phá lên cười mỗi khi con chó nhìn chúng tôi khi nó đói.
data.en_hint: We burst out laughing everytime our dog looks at us when he is hungry.
data.content_game_1: We burst out laughing everytime our dog looks at us when he is hungry.
data.answer_en_hint: We burst out laughing everytime our dog looks at us when he is hungry.

data.trans_hint: Hôm nay là ngày kỉ niệm của chúng tôi, vì vậy tôi có cơ hội mặc đẹp và làm anh ấy bất ngờ bằng một bữa tối lãng mạn.
data.en_hint: It is our anniversary today, so I take the chance to get dressed up and surprise him with a romantic dinner.
data.content_game_1: It is our anniversary today, so I take the chance to get dressed up and surprise him with a romantic dinner.
data.answer_en_hint: It is our anniversary today, so I take the chance to get dressed up and surprise him with a romantic dinner.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi đã phải nói với mọi người hãy cẩn thận, trong trường hợp bữa tiệc bất ngờ mà chúng tôi chuẩn bị cho mẹ tới tai bà ấy.
data.en_hint: We had to tell everyone to be careful, in case Mom get winds of the surprise party we planned for her.
data.content_game_1: We had to tell everyone to be careful, in case Mom get winds of the surprise party we planned for her.
data.answer_en_hint: We had to tell everyone to be careful, in case Mom get winds of the surprise party we planned for her.

data.trans_hint: Nếu anh ta không tiết lộ bí mật, bạn gái của tôi sẽ không biết về việc cầu hôn này.
data.en_hint: If he hadn't spilled the beans, my girlfriend would not have known about the proposal.
data.content_game_1: If he hadn't spilled the beans, my girlfriend would not have known about the proposal.
data.answer_en_hint: If he hadn't spilled the beans, my girlfriend would not have known about the proposal.

data.trans: Không bận tâm, không để tâm
data.trans_hint: Bạn tôi đã đang cố gắng sỉ nhục anh ta bằng cách nói rằng anh ta chỉ là một gã tồi, nhưng anh ta lại chỉ cười và không thèm để tâm đến.
data.en_hint: My friend was trying to insult him by saying that he was just a poor guy, but he just smiled and took no notice.
data.content_game_1: My friend was trying to insult him by saying that he was just a poor guy, but he just smiled and took no notice.
data.answer_en_hint: My friend was trying to insult him by saying that he was just a poor guy, but he just smiled and took no notice.

data.trans: Đảm đương, chịu trách nhiệm về
data.trans_hint: Trong bữa tiệc vào thứ Bảy này,tôi sẽ đảm đương việc nấu ăn và Josh sẽ chịu trách nhiệm đi mời khách.
data.en_hint: For the party this Saturday, I will take charge of cooking and Josh will be responsible for inviting the guests.
data.content_game_1: For the party this Saturday, I will take charge of cooking and Josh will be responsible for inviting the guests.
data.answer_en_hint: For the party this Saturday, I will take charge of cooking and Josh will be responsible for inviting the guests.

data.trans: Tổ chức tiệc (đặc biệt là ở nhà)
data.trans_hint: Ngày cuối cùng của Peter là thứ Năm này, chúng ta có nên tổ chức tiệc chia tay cho anh ấy không nhỉ?
data.en_hint: Peter's last day is this Thursday, should we throw him a party to farewell?
data.content_game_1: Peter's last day is this Thursday, should we throw him a party to farewell?
data.answer_en_hint: Peter's last day is this Thursday, should we throw him a party to farewell?

data.trans_hint: Sau khi cô dâu và chú rể trao nhẫn cưới, đám đông hò hét lên "Hôn cô dâu đi".
data.en_hint: After the bride and the groom exchanged rings, the crowd yelled out "Kiss the bride".
